actions.name: Relic Soloist
actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves Relic Song.

Effect: The user transforms into its Pirouette Forme. The user may also change to Pirouette Forme as either a Simple Action (4 PP), or as a Downtime Action.

actions.name: Relic Soloist (Active)
actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves Relic Song.

Effect: The user transforms into its Pirouette Forme.

actions.description: Effect: The user transforms into its Pirouette Forme.

actions.name: Relic Song
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of gaining @Affliction[drowsy] 7.

actions.name: Amplifier
actions.description: Effect: The user's [Sonic] attacks have 30% more Power and have their Range increased by 50%.

actions.name: Benevolent Gift
actions.description: Effect: The duration of effects caused or created by the user is increased by 2.
